notes:
The blue butterfly is semi-rare and moves faster than the [[Butterfly (Purple)|Purple Butterfly]].

{{JSpoiler|Their dead bodies can be put in a [[Butterfly Conservation Kit]] to be used in [[The Explorer Society Quest]].}}
name: Butterfly (Blue)
location: [[Yalahar]], [[Tiquanda]], the [[Shattered Isles]], [[Cormaya]], [[Carlin]] Surroundings (near the [[Tired Tree]]), [[Kazordoon]] Surroundings (near the [[Grumpy Stone]]) and some other places.
strategy: Just attack. Since it doesn't drop any loot, you should just leave it alone unless it gets in your way.
